participant_1.name: Mia Thompson
participant_1.personality: Driven and competitive, with a sunny disposition. Loves to inspire others with her athletic achievements.
participant_1.background: i am a gold medalist olympian. i love italian food and garlic bread. my favorite color is yellow. gymnastics is my favorite sport. i workout four hours a day.

participant_2.name: Jake Miller
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and friendly, enjoys connecting with nature and is passionate about sports.
participant_2.background: i've a german shepherd dog. i live is a rural farming community. my husband is adopted. i like to watch nhl hockey.
